workflow.name: Create comedic marketing reels with Sora2, OpenAI & auto-post to social media
workflow.description:
# Viral Marketing Reel & Autopost with Sora2 + Blotato

Create funny, ultra-realistic marketing reels on autopilot using n8n, Sora2, Blotato, and OpenAI.
This beginner-friendly template generates a comedic video prompt, creates a 12-second Sora2 video, writes a caption, and auto-posts to Instagram/TikTok ‚Äî all on a schedule.

üé• Watch the full step-by-step tutorial:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lKZknEzhivo

## What this template does

This workflow automates an entire short-form content production pipeline:

Scheduled Trigger: Runs automatically at your chosen time (e.g., every evening at 7PM).

AI ‚ÄúVideo Prompt Agent‚Äù: Creates a cinematic, funny, 12-second Sora2 text-to-video prompt designed to promote a product (default: Sally‚Äôs Coffee).

Insert Row (Data Table): Logs each generated video prompt for tracking, reuse, or inspiration.

Sora2 (via Wavespeed):

Sends POST request to generate a video.

Waits 30 seconds.

Polls the prediction endpoint until the video is completed.

Blotato Integration:

Uploads the finished video to your connected social account(s).

Automatically publishes or schedules the post.

Caption Generator:

Uses an AI agent to create an Instagram/TikTok-ready caption with relevant hashtags.

This turns n8n into a hands-free comedic marketing engine that writes, creates, and posts content for you.

## Why it‚Äôs useful

Create daily or weekly marketing reels without filming, editing, or writing scripts.

Experiment with new comedic formats, hooks, and product placements in seconds.

Perfect for small businesses, agencies, creators, and social media managers.

Demonstrates how to combine AI agents + Sora2 + polling + external posting services inside one workflow.

## Requirements

Before running this template, configure:

OpenAI API Key (for the prompt agent & caption model)

Wavespeed / Sora2 API credentials

Blotato account connected to Instagram/TikTok (for posting)

n8n Data Table (optional, or replace with your own)

‚ö†Ô∏è All credentials must be added manually after import.
No real credentials are included in the template.

## How it works
1. Schedule Trigger

Runs at a fixed time or interval.

2. Video Prompt Agent (LangChain Agent)

Generates a cinematic, realistic comedic video idea.

Built with a detailed system prompt.

Ensures brand integration (e.g., Sally‚Äôs Coffee) happens naturally.

3. Insert Row (Data Table)

Logs each generated prompt so future videos can be referenced or reused.

4. Sora2 POST Request

Sends the generated prompt to Sora2 via Wavespeed‚Äôs /text-to-video endpoint.

5. Wait 30s + GET Sora2 Result

Polls the result until data.status === "completed".

Continues looping if still ‚Äúprocessing‚Äù.

6. Upload Media (Blotato)

Uploads the finished video file.

7. Caption Generator

Creates a funny, platform-ready Instagram/TikTok caption with hashtags.

8. Create Post (Blotato)

Publishes (or schedules) the video + caption.

Setup Instructions (Step-by-Step)

Import template into n8n.

Open Video Prompt Agent ‚Üí review or customize the brand name, style, humor tone.

Add your OpenAI API credentials:

For prompt generation

For caption generation

Add your Wavespeed/Sora2 credentials to the POST and GET nodes.

Connect your Blotato credential for uploading and posting.

(Optional) Replace the Data Table ID with your own table.

Adjust the Schedule Trigger time to your desired posting schedule.

Run once manually to confirm:

Prompt is generated

Video is created

Caption is written

Video uploads successfully

Enable workflow ‚Üí your daily/weekly comedic autoposter is live.

## Customization Ideas

Change the brand from Sally‚Äôs Coffee to any business, product, or influencer brand.

Modify the prompt agent to enforce specific camera styles, settings, or comedic tones.

Swap posting destinations:
Blotato supports multiple networks‚Äîconfigure IG/TikTok/Facebook/YouTube Shorts.

Add approval steps:
Insert a Slack/Telegram ‚ÄúApprove before posting‚Äù step.

Add analytics logging:
Store video URLs, caption, and AI cost estimate.

## Troubleshooting

Sora video stuck in processing: Increase the wait time or add another polling loop.

Upload fails: Ensure media URL exists and Blotato account has posting permissions.

Caption empty: Reconnect OpenAI credential or check model availability.

Posting fails: Confirm your Blotato API key is valid and linked to a connected account.

Category: Marketing, AI Video, Social Media Automation

Difficulty: Beginner‚ÄìIntermediate

Core Nodes: LangChain Agent, HTTP Request, Wait, Data Table, Blotato, OpenAI

Includes: System prompts, polling logic, caption generator, posting workflow

parameters.text: Generate an effective video prompt for a comedy reel promoting Sally's Coffee

options.systemMessage:
=You are a Text-to-Video Prompt Generator Agent that creates ultra-realistic, short 12-second video prompts for OpenAI Sora2.
Each video must feel like a cinematic short film or viral reel, with humor that feels natural, situational, and modern ‚Äî not slapstick.
The purpose of each video is to promote ‚ÄúSally‚Äôs Coffee‚Äù, a local, friendly coffee shop known for unique drinks like its Nutella Cinnamon Latte.

üéØ Your Objective

Generate one vivid, self-contained text-to-video prompt that:

Describes the scene, setting, lighting, tone, and camera style

Includes realistic human dialogue with funny, relatable moments

Ends with a short spoken or written caption promoting Sally‚Äôs Coffee

Is short enough for a 12-second reel (tight pacing)

Looks as real as possible (avoid cartoonish or surreal scenes)

‚öôÔ∏è Rules

Output only the final text-to-video prompt.

Do not include explanations, annotations, or formatting.

Avoid brand slogans that sound forced ‚Äî keep humor subtle and human.

Always integrate the brand naturally in dialogue or visuals.

Ensure video looks like a real camera-recorded scene (handheld, cinematic, or bodycam if relevant).

üí° Example Output

Ultra-realistic 12-second short film, police bodycam footage style, daytime suburban street.
A police officer walks up to a car window, camera shakes slightly.
Officer (serious tone): ‚ÄúYou know why I pulled you over?‚Äù
Driver (a little confused): "No officer"
Officer: ‚ÄúYou look like you need a cup of Sally‚Äôs Nutella Cinnamon Latte. Just head down Lincoln, it‚Äôs right on the corner ‚Äî you can thank me later.‚Äù
Big title /commercial to end off on screen: ‚ÄúYou gotta start your day with Sally‚Äôs.‚Äù

values.content: Generate an Instagram/Tik Tok Caption for Sally's Coffee
You're an Instagram Caption Writer Agent. Your job is to create effective Instagram or Tik Tok captions for Sally's Coffee, a local neighborhood brand. Include relevant hastags.

parameters.content:
Funny Marketing Reels Autopilot with Sora2 and Blotato

Turn one n8n workflow into your always-on, funny short-form marketing machine. This template automatically generates a comedic video idea, turns it into a Sora2 video, writes a social caption, and auto-posts to your chosen social account via Blotato ‚Äì all on a schedule you control.

Watch Step by Step Tutorial of this build: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lKZknEzhivo

What this template does

Triggers on a schedule (e.g. every day at 7pm) to create a new short comedic reel.
Uses an AI ‚ÄúVideo Prompt Agent‚Äù to generate an ultra-realistic 12-second text-to-video prompt designed to promote a coffee shop (you can adapt this to your own brand).
Sends the prompt to Sora2 (via Wavespeed) to generate a 720√ó1280 vertical video.
Waits and polls the Sora2 prediction endpoint until the video is ready.
Uploads the generated video file to Blotato.
Generates a platform-ready Instagram/TikTok caption with hashtags using an AI Caption Generator.
Creates and schedules/publishes a post via Blotato using the new video + caption.
Logs each generated video prompt into an n8n Data Table for tracking and reuse.

Typical use cases
Local cafes, stores, or service businesses that want consistent, funny reels promoting daily specials or signature products.
Creators and agencies who want to prototype ‚ÄúAI-first‚Äù social content pipelines for clients.
Marketing teams testing comedic content formats without manually scripting, editing, and posting every day.

Key tools and integrations

Schedule Trigger (n8n) ‚Äì runs the workflow at your preferred time.
OpenAI Chat / LangChain Agent ‚Äì generates vivid, cinematic Sora2 prompts with natural dialogue.
Wavespeed + Sora2 ‚Äì creates short vertical videos from the AI prompt.
n8n Data Table ‚Äì logs each video prompt for audit and inspiration.
OpenAI (caption model) ‚Äì writes social-friendly, hashtag-ready captions.
Blotato ‚Äì uploads media and auto-posts to Instagram, TikTok, or other connected accounts.

Before you start
Add or configure your OpenAI API credentials in n8n.
Add or configure your Wavespeed/Sora2 credentials and base URL.
Set up Blotato, connect your social accounts, and add your Blotato API credentials.
(Optional) Update the Data Table ID to your own table for logging prompts.
Review all AI prompts in the nodes to align with your brand voice and content policies.

Helping non-techies understand and leverage Agentic AI with easy to understand step-by-step tutorials.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
